casebody.data:
Edythe HAMMOND, Plaintiff-Appellant, v. INSURANCE COMPANY OF NORTH AMERICA, Defendant-Respondent. No. 131. Circuit Court of Appeals, Second Circuit. Dec. 23, 1940. Walsh & Levine, of New York City (William F. Walsh and Abraham Green-bush, both of New York City, of counsel), for appellant. Bigham, Englar, Jones & Houston, of New York City (George S. Brengle and Henry J. Bogatko, both of New York City, of counsel), for respondent.

Before SWAN and CLARK, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM.

Judgment affirmed, 37 F.Supp. 674, on opinion below.
